title: Executive Order 6059-Authorizing the Appointment of Irvin S. Goldbarth
content: Irvin S. Goldbarth may be appointed as Clerk in the Custodian Service at the Federal Building in Richmond, Virginia, without compliance with the requirements of the Civil Service rules.
This order is recommended by the Secretary of the Treasury.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 6059-Authorizing the Appointment of Irvin S. Goldbarth Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361609
